title: $25 Subway Card
body:
Hey Riot,
I got a $25 Subway Card and I was wondering how I could redeem the full $25 since there is no $25 option. Or do I have to redeem $20 and then $5?
Thanks

replies.body: You can do that option, but u won't get the same amount of rp as buying a $25 league game card. The league card gives u 3500 rp. However, using $20 subway would give u 2800 and $5 will be 650. If added correctly, it will be only 3450, or 50 rp short. So riot, PLEASE GIVE ME MY 50 RP THAT I SHOULD OF HAVE GOTTEN!!! IT'S NOT FAIR HOW WE PAID THE SAME PRICE BUT GOT LESS THAN WE DESERVED. WE ARE PAYING CUSTOMERS TOO!!!
Yeeaaa it seems you'll need to make a charge for $20 and then a separate $5 if you're wanting to use up the total balance on that card.
